channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How To Rethink Your Job As AI Agents Reshape Work
item.description: AI agents are beginning to automate routine work across every profession, changing how jobs are structured and where humans add value.

item.title: The world’s leading blockchain-based taxi app is setting its sights on New York City
item.description: TADA was founded in Singapore in 2018 by two South Korean tech entrepreneurs: Kay Woo and Jay Han. The ride-hailing app is best known for its “zero co...

item.title: After 23 years working for Jeff Bezos, the CEO of a $1.3 billion skills platform shares lessons he learned from Andy Jassy and the Amazon founder
item.description: In 1997, the day before Greg Hart joined Amazon, he was summoned to a meeting—on a Sunday—with its founder, Jeff Bezos.

item.title: iPhone Air 2 Release Date Now In Question After New Leak
item.description: When is the next iPhone Air expected? Well, a new report has good news for those impatient for the update.

item.title: Exactly 13 Years From Today Is A ‘Christmas Eclipse’ — Where To See It
item.description: A total solar eclipse on December 26, 2038, will be visible in parts of Australia and New Zealand.

item.title: As millions of Gen Zers face unemployment, CEOs of Amazon, Walmart, and McDonald’s say opportunity is still there—if you have the right mindset
item.description: From Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang to Amazon boss Andy Jassy, Fortune 500 leaders have shared their advice for workers to thrive in today’s shaky job market...

item.title: The Holiday Dissonance: Why AI’s Real Gift This Season Isn’t Efficiency—It’s Permission To Protect Your Sanity
item.description: This holiday season, AI isn’t just about efficiency—it’s your permission to reclaim rest. Learn how artificial intelligence can reduce decision fatigu...

item.title: The $40 Billion Healthcare AI Failure—And The EMR Divide Sabotaging Progress
item.description: Healthcare is investing billions in AI, yet most projects fail to scale. This analysis examines the EMR Divide and why only 4% of organizations achiev...

item.title: ‘He satisfies a lot of my needs’: Meet the women in love with ChatGPT
item.description: The majority of women in these relationships say they feel misunderstood, and that AI bots have helped them during periods of isolation, grief, and il...

item.title: The books, TV series, and podcasts CEOs are tuning into this holiday season to unwind and elevate their careers in 2026
item.description: Fortune got a sneak peek into what CEOs will be reading, watching, and listening to this holiday season from The Diary of a CEO to Love Actually.

item.title: $400k shipment of live lobsters hijacked en route to Midwest Costco locations
item.description: The FBI is investigating the theft of a $400,000 lobster delivery bound for Costco locations in Illinois and Minnesota that was allegedly hijacked.

item.title: Jack in the Box shut down more than 70 stores with more expected by year's end over financial struggles
item.description: Jack in the Box is closing dozens of restaurants as part of a major cost-cutting plan, with 72 locations shuttered so far and more expected in the nea...

item.title: How Dec. 26 became the best day of the year for stock-market investors
Michael Bublé is coming for Mariah Carey’s Christmas-music crown
Mortgage rates fall ahead of Christmas holiday
item.description: The average rate on a 30-year fixed mortgage fell this week to 6.18%, according to the latest Freddie Mac data released on Wednesday. That is down fro...

item.title: Holiday barks sold at Aldi recalled over potential undeclared pecans, wheat: FDA
item.description: Silvestri Sweets recalled Choceur-branded holiday bark sold at Aldi stores after a packaging mix-up led to undeclared allergens in the popular treats.

item.title: S&P 500 closes at fresh record high in holiday-shortened session
Move over Mariah: How Michael Bublé is becoming the king of Christmas music
S&P 500 hits record high on Christmas Eve for first time in more than a decade
Where you can shop for your last-minute Christmas needs
item.description: Need last-minute holiday essentials? Find out which major retailers like Target have modified hours on Christmas Eve and will close for the holiday.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
